subject: Suits and Litigation
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The suit is one of the more aggressive moves Major League Baseball has taken in to try to thwart doping, and it could lead to other officials in sports suing suspected suppliers of banned drugs.
snippet: The suit is one of the more aggressive moves Major League Baseball has taken in to try to thwart doping, and it could lead to other officials in sports suing suspected suppliers of banned drugs.
